overview: This is Doro Pesch's 20th anniversary and this 2-dvd set, backed by her band featuring Joe Taylor, NIck Douglas, Johnny Dee and Olover Palotai, are featured in live footage from Balve, Germany. Disc 2 features Doro around the world, also includes 11 music videos and special session footage with Warlock, a photo session, more.
title: Doro - Für Immer
